title: Dynamic Music : TRANSPOSE
description: Dynamic Music Album for Stealth Action Games!
longDescription:
Dynamic Music Pack #1

Album Name : "Transpose"

Composer : Mag


Elevate Your Stealth Game with DYNAMIC MUSIC!

Step into the world of covert operations with our first Dynamic Music Pack, designed to enhance the tension and excitement of stealth/action games. This pack offers a collection of high-quality, expertly composed music tracks that adapt seamlessly to both Caution and Alert situations, providing a dynamic audio experience that perfectly matches the ebb and flow of your gameplay.


Theme: Secret Services & Spy Ops

Genres: Orchestral/Classical & Electronic/Synthwave


Key Features:

  • Dynamic Soundscapes: Tracks are crafted to dynamically transition between Caution and Alert states, keeping players immersed in the tension of the moment.
  • Perfect for Stealth: Whether your game demands subtlety or a sudden burst of intensity, this pack delivers the right audio atmosphere at the right time.
  • Layered Tracks (Bonus): Some tracks include layers that allow further customization, giving you additional control over the music, though this is more of a bonus feature.
  • Consistent Theme : It's about a Spy agent going rogue (Agent1). There are also music for cinematics. A whole package for you to tell your own story. (Please contact me first if you wanna use it for a TV show or something...(not that I'll charge extra, I just wanna see the work :D Because this pack is ROYALTY FREE))


IDM Compatibility: Fully compatible with the Instant Dynamic Music (IDM) system, ensuring that the music responds in real-time to the player's actions and in-game events.

Take your game's audio to the next level with Dynamic Music Pack #1. Perfect for creating those nail-biting moments where every sound matters.
technicalDetails:
WHAT IS DYNAMIC MUSIC?
ALBUM PREVIEW


  • Human Composed. Yes, nowadays it's a feature. Because it means the whole album is Consistent.
  • Dynamic. You can use your own code, or use "Instant Dynamic Music"
  • Some pieces have their stems exported. Creativity doors are wide open here!


Number of Audio Wavs: 21

Number of Audio Cues: 21

Sample rate : (44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: (Yes, some of them do not)

Minutes of audio provided: 33+

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Important/Additional Notes: 8 Piece of music in Total. 3 of them has "ALERT/CAUTION" mode ready (Loopable).
